eventDecorators.name: Unstake
eventDecorators.description: Triggered when the treasury address has been updated.

eventDecorators.name: VotesActivated
eventDecorators.description: Triggered when the treasury address has been updated.

eventDecorators.name: VotesCast
eventDecorators.description: Triggered when the treasury address has been updated.

functionDecorators.name: activate
functionDecorators.description: Activates pending votes (if ready) with a given validator group.

functionDecorators.name: getActiveVotes
functionDecorators.description: Get active votes (staked + rewards) for this smart contract.

functionDecorators.name: getPendingVotes
functionDecorators.description: Get pending votes for this smart contract.

functionDecorators.name: getRewards
functionDecorators.description: Get active votes (staked + rewards) for this smart contract.

functionDecorators.name: getStakeForAccount
functionDecorators.description: Returns the amount a certain address is currently staking with Spirals.

functionDecorators.name: setValidatorGroup
functionDecorators.description: For updating with validator group we stake with. Performs some simple checks to make sure address given is an eligible validator group (limited to 1 for now).

functionDecorators.name: stake
functionDecorators.description: Main function for staking with Spirals protocol.
